body: RIP Mogudan you were a true artist and follower of your waifu Ayanami Rei. Let's hope that the bad times may cease, so that you can show your dedication once again. Studio Khara shall perish!!!
I fap to the art, not for the text anyway
So the boyfriend plot still is going on damn
This is why I come to nHentai, yall just fought, and SETTLED a dispute between why cucking is gay.

I some how agree with @IHatekillallcucks. If you go see a movie and you don't like it you don't spend the whole time yelling at the other people there because you didn't like the move. Just get up and live that it.
You mean we should read and wank to cuck doujinshis?
Or just plain out Jerk it off to it
But still you shouldn't really ruin that for others if they enjoy it
Ahh I see well my mistake @KillACucks. Its understandable to see people hate to see good doujinshi art be used for ntr and other genres they might not like.

@IhateKillallcucks dude I'm just a cheap copycat of the one and true Master of Our Order, Iexpectedbetter, so it's not me you should be going after. Still, I'm glad to take a bullet for him any day, so do as thou wilt :P As for the point of the anti-cuck crusade, I assure you that none of us would actually like to see all cucks die, or even NTR get legitimately banned. Wank to whatever you want. It's just frustrating that so many doujinshis with glorious art are completely off-limits for those of us who can't bear the abomination that is cuckoldry, and it is to vent that frustration that we shit on cucks.
Lol, what's with all the new accounts made within the last 24 hours?

the only faggot here is you

They just want to be an artistic troll by posting nothing but nonsense. It's very sad to be honest when he/she can be fapping/fingering away.
@DoomsWind lol so am I

Yea. Honestly. As much as i hate ntr and rape. Some of them just kinda turn me on and make me feel bad, which is why i hate them.
But on the other hand I love vanilla, makes me feel good inside, turns me on and is my fetish and wish i could read more of it, but a lot of them don't have really good artists which is a turn off, so i naturally head back to some of the other ones.

All i have to say is really, no one should be shitting on ntr or vanilla people. If you really want to stop something, spend the time to write a letter to the artist or something idk.
That or don't look at the hentai. Anyways. Until we meet again ya losers. :D

Must be nice having no life. Being able to stay on the site 24/7 to comment on tag that you say you hate but still take the time to go on them. Telling people to kill themselves and telling people rape is the same thing as ntr/cheating you guys are living the life. I'm so  so jealous!

Did you know about the tragedy of killallcucks? No? I thought not. Its not a story a Thot Slayer would tell you. It's a vanilla fag legend. Killallcucks was a master of hating NTR, so powerful and so wise he could comment every NTR doujin and get shit on the comment sections... He had such knowledge of the dark art, he can probably go comment something better for 2 decades . But alas, he chose to use his powers in service of shitting on any NTR doujin and being a vanilla fag. It is an unspoken loss of mankind as a whole, and particularly to Evafags, like... me.

Did you ever hear the tragedy of Mogudan the Cucker? No? I thought not. It's not a story a Thot Slayer would tell you. It's a cuck legend. Mogudan was a Master of Thiccness, so powerful and so wise he could use MSPaint to influence the weebs to flush life down their toilets… He had such a knowledge of the dark art, he could even keep the 2 decade old cartoon series he cared about from dying. But alas, he chose to use his powers in service of the cucks. It is an unspoken loss for mankind as a whole, and particularly to Evafags, like... me.
